title: Firefox for Android 51.0beta Beta

notes.note: Added Nepali (ne-NP), Bulgarian (bg) and Kabyle (kab) locales
Use 2D graphics library (Skia) for content rendering

system_requirements:
## Operating systems
 - Android 4.0
 - Above versions

## Requirements
 - 50 MB internal storage
 - 384 MB of RAM
 - display at least 320 pixels high and 240 pixels wide
